span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用來逐一查看的集合類別物件。Use the class to iterate through a collection of objects. 您可以存取這個集合的物件使用屬性或屬性。You can access this collection of objects using the property or the property. 類別也用來建立自訂擴充的型別類別。The class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. /configSections> ```
